title: Showing Feet in Racial Chat Rooms
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, it’s the Dustin Ross takeover. We step into The Crime Zone with the case of a missing Andrew Gosden.

Black Business of the Week: Studio Yezi Crowdfunding https://jumpstarter.co.za/projects/sola-the-animated-short
